summary: This bill, the "Greater Leadership Overseas for the Benefit of Equality Act of 2025" or "GLOBE Act of 2025," aims to protect and advance LGBTQI human rights globally. It mandates reporting on anti-LGBTQI violence in U.S. country reports, establishes a Special Envoy for LGBTQI Human Rights, and imposes sanctions on individuals responsible for human rights violations. The bill also addresses immigration reform for LGBTQI individuals seeking asylum, facilitates permanent partnerships, guarantees citizenship to children born abroad using assisted reproductive technology, and promotes LGBTQI inclusion in foreign assistance programs and international organizations.
